title: Out of the FSI allowed in PMAY, 10% of the basic FSI mentioned in Regulation No
clause_text: Out of the FSI allowed in PMAY, 10% of the basic FSI mentioned in Regulation No.6.1 or 6.3, shall be allowed for commercial use.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Out of the FSI allowed in PMAY, 10% of the basic FSI mentioned in Regulation No.6.1 or 6.3, shall be allowed for commercial use.
